extends IHandleDDFFunctionalGroup

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Copies the identified DDF "files" from the specified source to destination.
      List<String> listItems(String namespace)
      Returns a list of existing objects we have in the given namespace in persistent storage
      List<String> listNamespaces()
      Returns a list of existing namespaces we have in persistent storage

      IHandlePersistence.IPersistible load(String uri)
      Loads DDF from given URI.
      IHandlePersistence.IPersistible load(String namespace, String name)
      Loads from default persistent storage into a DDF
      APersistenceHandler.PersistenceUri persist(boolean doOverwrite)
      Saves the current DDF to our default persistent storage, at minimum by namespace and name, together with the DDF's metadata, and in whatever serialized format that can be read back in later.
      void rename(String fromNamespace, String fromName, String toNamespace, String toName, boolean doOverwrite)
      Same as duplicate followed by unpersist() of the old copy
      void unpersist(String namespace, String name)
      Deletes the identified DDF "file" from persistent storage.

      • persist

        APersistenceHandler.PersistenceUri persist(boolean doOverwrite)
                                           throws DDFException
        Saves the current DDF to our default persistent storage, at minimum by namespace and name, together with the DDF's metadata, and in whatever serialized format that can be read back in later.
        Parameters:
        doOverwrite - overwrites if true
        Returns:
        PersistenceUri of persisted location
        Throws:
        DDFException - if doOverwrite is false and the destination already exists

      • unpersist

        void unpersist(String namespace,
             String name)
               throws DDFException
        Deletes the identified DDF "file" from persistent storage. This does not affect any DDF currently loaded in memory or in processing space.
        Parameters:
        namespace -
        name -
        Throws:
        DDFException - if specified target does not exist

      • load

        IHandlePersistence.IPersistible load(String uri)
                                     throws DDFException
        Loads DDF from given URI. The URI format should be: 
         ://
        e.g., 
         basic:///root/ddf/ddf-runtime/basic-ddf-db/com.example/MyDDF.dat
        If the engine is not specified, the current DDF's engine is used.
        Parameters:
        uri -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DDFException
